overview: Laborers during the day, rock musicians during the night, three Afghan boys and a girl born  and raised in Iran, go on a journey to perform their first rock concert ever in a war-torn  motherland they have never seen: Afghanistan.
tagline: Laborers during the day, rock musicians during the night, three Afghan boys and a girl born and raised in Iran, go on a journey to perform their first rock concert ever in a war-torn motherland they have never seen: Afghanistan.
title: The Forbidden Strings
